title: Cross-linking impacts the physical properties of mycelium leather alternatives by targeting hydroxyl groups of polysaccharides and amino groups of proteins
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Antonio d’Errico, Michaela Schröpfer, Anke Mondschein, Adil A. Safeer, Marc Baldus, Han A.B. Wösten
